text:
Hi! Iâ€™m using this tag `page_meta.html_title|split(' | ')|last` to display the tag title on tag pages. By default it also adds the page number after the title. Ex: Tag Title (2). How can I remove the page number bit?

`// later edit //`
For future references, I used a replace_regex to remove the parentheses and the numbers:
`page_meta.html_title|split(' | ')|last|regex_replace('.[[:digit:]]+.', '')`

<@U02CS2Q38QG> Is this what you are looking for?
```{% for tag in content.tag_list %}
  {% if tag.id == tag_id %}
    <h1 data-slug="{{ tag.slug }}">{{ tag.name }}</h1>
    <p>{{ tag.description }}</p>
  {% endif %}
{% endfor %}```
_require blog-listing.html -> content_
Kind of, I wanted the `tag.name` but outside the `content` loop.
